message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think you'll find it very valuable. How about $130?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $120 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down a little. How about $125?
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $123?
